mapper.select: select `id` AS id, `mod_name` AS modName, `mod_type` AS modType, `mod_ename` AS modEname, `mod_pay` AS modPay, `mod_fee` AS modFee, `mod_day` AS modDay, `remark` AS remark FROM train_model t WHERE modEname = #{modEname} AND del_flag = 0
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM train_model WHERE mod_ename = #{modEname} AND del_flag = 0

SELECT tap.id, u.`name`, u.nickname, u.mobile, u.type, tap.user_id, tap.apply_type AS applyType, tap.status, tap.create_date AS createDate from sys_user u LEFT JOIN train_apply tap ON tap.user_id=u.id WHERE 1=1
AND u.mobile LIKE '%'||#{mobile}||'%' CONCAT('%', #{mobile}, '%')
AND tap.status in (0,1)

SELECT u.`name`, u.nickname, u.mobile, u.type, tap.apply_type AS applyType, tap.audit_type AS auditType, tap.create_date AS createDate, tf.`name` AS companyName, tf.short_name AS shortName, tf.charter_card AS charterCard, tf.address, tf.legal_person AS legalPerson, tf.legal_mobile AS legalMobile, tf.legal_card AS legalCard, tf.icardone, tf.icardtwo, tf.intro from sys_user u LEFT JOIN train_apply tap ON tap.user_id=u.id LEFT JOIN train_franchisee_info tf ON tf.apply_id= tap.id WHERE del_flag = 0 AND tap.user_id = #{userid} and tap.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_franchisee ( parent_id, parent_ids, name, code, address, legal_name, mobile, create_by, create_date, icardone, icardtwo, intro ) VALUES ( '0', '0,1', #{companyName}, #{charterCard}, #{address}, #{legalPerson}, #{mobile}, #{createBy.name}, SYSDATE(), icardone, icardtwo, intro )
